features: Nourishing Body Lotion - This moisturizing lotion goes beyond other body moisturizers to soothe dry skin with sweet almond & vanilla gourmand scent. Hydrate like a star with vanilla scented lotion.*
Coconut Oil & Cocoa Butter - Get starstruck with these sweet shea butter based body lotions enhanced with natural oils, maple syrup and sweet vanilla scent for a seriously smooth finish.*

Deeper Body Care - Stars align in this body lotion for women that locks in moisture & leaves skin feeling nourished. Unlike most womens body lotion, Smoothie helps maintain deeper, glowing hydration.*
Treat Your Skin - Smoothie Star skin lotion redefines extra with strawberry, vanilla, pistachio and brown sugar aromas for a delectable moisturizer for dry skin. Sample all our scented body lotions!
Shea Butter for Skin & Soul - Indulge in the sensuous moisturizing body lotion experience that will leave your body softer from our hydrating moisturizer and your senses awakened with scent.*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great like Butters
reviews.reviewText: This makes your skin feel like you’ve exfoliated with a loofah. It is just so creamy and I usually use the Vaseline one. I’m don’t know if I’m allowed to say the name starts with an a and then put the E one on top of that and then a regular glycerin very dry skin excellent No-brainer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kind of disappointed with this lotion
reviews.reviewText: I'm a dude who loves this company and uses some of their other products from time to time. I bought this lotion for the first time and was kind of disappointed with the texture/smell. I learned quickly that you only need a small amount because otherwise, it will leave your skin feeling sticky for quite some time after use. The smell also isn't my favorite (not that it's bad or anything), but just not as good as some of their other scents. However, it does do a good job at keeping the skin moisturized, so it does what it's intended to do. Overall, I would recommend this product but would probably not buy again for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not only does this smell great but more importantly it works! It leaves behind a nice sheen that isn’t sticky and it moisturizes and takes away the wrinkled look of my hands all day! Finally found a cream that makes my hands young again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly loved the scent and it goes on so smoothly. Will buy again.
